title: Intentional Feeders in Promotion Series.
body:
i hope @riotgames will invent a system that can detect an intentional feeder is in your game and not only punish them, but have them clear that game from a persons promotional game.
For example, an Ahri in my previous game was intentional feeding, she started after 15 minutes when she lost her lane, she then goes and starts to run it down mid consecutively for the next 5 minutes giver her 10 deaths, as a result the enemy Zed was extremely fed and could 1 shout almost our entire team, we eventually lost because zed was too strong and i got a loss that counted towards my Silver promotional series (this gappend the very next game with a Twitch instead...). 
Now, with the system that i am currently thinking of, it will punish the intentional feeder, BUT ALSO, that game would not count to a players Win/Loss promotional series, regardless of results.

replies.body: China already has a system like this in place on their servers
